info.name: Facebook Monochrome.
info.description:
This is the Facebook Monochrome theme from Social FIxer. Using it as a separate style means no reload lag time.

I am unable to share the .css here, because it is too long. Open the link, then open stylish, click write a new style, and copy / paste the .css from the link. Then save as Facebook Monochrome.

https://docs.google.com/file/d/0B593jkXeASC6c05fVG5UUGZxNTA/edit?usp=sharing

If you guys like it, please feel free to post a comment that you've installed it and enjoy it.
